trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" /> class represents the structure, or schema, of a data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" /> 類別 (Class) 表示資料來源的結構或結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema> class to list the elements of a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>列出在設計階段資料來源之項目的類別。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> uses a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to list the views and fields.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema>使用<xref:System.Data.DataSet>列出檢視和欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema> class is used by custom control designer components to provide lists of views and fields for data-bound controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>類別可由自訂控制項的設計工具元件來提供資料繫結控制項在設計階段的檢視和欄位清單。

trans-unit.source: To examine the components of data using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the following classes:
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查的資料使用的元件<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，使用下列類別：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" /> instance will describe.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 執行個體將描述的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" /> class using a specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema" /> 來建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array containing information about each view in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列，其中包含資料來源中每一個檢視的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> objects returned by this method can be converted to a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>這個方法所傳回的物件可以轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>物件。
